data.name: Privacy.Title
data.value: wPrivacy notice

data.name: Privacy.IfYouUse
data.value: wIf you use the 'Report packaging data' service, Defra will:

data.name: Privacy.BeTheDataController
data.value: wbe the data controller

data.name: Privacy.BeResponsibleFor
data.value: wbe responsible for processing any data you share with them

data.name: Privacy.ADataController
data.value: wA data controller determines how and why personal data is processed. For more information, read Defra’s entry in the

data.name: Privacy.DataProtectionPublic
data.value: wData Protection Public Register.

data.name: Privacy.WhatDataWeCollect
data.value: wWhat data we collect

data.name: Privacy.ThePersonalData
data.value: wThe personal data we collect from you includes:

data.name: Privacy.YourInternetProtocol
data.value: wyour Internet Protocol (IP) address, and details of which version of

data.name: Privacy.WebBrowser
data.value: wweb browser

data.name: Privacy.YouUsed
data.value: wyou used

data.name: Privacy.InformationOnHowYou
data.value: winformation on how you use the site,

data.name: Privacy.UsingCookies
data.value: wusing cookies

data.name: Privacy.AndPageTagging
data.value: wand page tagging techniques

data.name: Privacy.QuestionsQueriesOrFeedback
data.value: wquestions, queries or feedback you leave

data.name: Privacy.PublishAndManage
data.value: wpublish and manage their own privacy notice with details of how to contact them

data.name: Privacy.WhereYouProvide
data.value: wWhere you provide your consent, we use

data.name: Privacy.GoogleAnalytics
data.value: wGoogle Analytics

data.name: Privacy.AndAzureSentinel
data.value: wand Azure Sentinel to collect information about how you use GOV.UK. This includes IP addresses.

data.name: Privacy.GoogleAnalyticsProcesses
data.value: wGoogle Analytics processes information about:

data.name: Privacy.ThePagesYouVisit
data.value: wthe pages you visit on GOV.UK

data.name: Privacy.HowLongYouSpend
data.value: whow long you spend on each GOV.UK page

data.name: Privacy.HowYouGotTo
data.value: whow you got to the site

data.name: Privacy.WhatYouClickOn
data.value: wwhat you click on while you’re visiting the site

data.name: Privacy.WeMakeSure
data.value: wWe make sure you cannot be directly identified by Google Analytics data. We do this by using

data.name: Privacy.GoogleAnalyticsIpAddressAnonymisation
data.value: wGoogle Analytics' IP address anonymisation

data.name: Privacy.FeatureAndByRemoving
data.value: wfeature and by removing any other personal data from the titles or URLs of the pages you visit.

data.name: Privacy.WeWillNotCombine
data.value: wWe will not combine analytics information with other data sets in a way that would directly identify who you are.

data.name: Privacy.FindOutMore
data.value: wFind out more about how we use Google Analytics and other cookies on GOV.UK.

data.name: Privacy.WhyWeNeedYourData
data.value: wWhy we need your data

data.name: Privacy.WeCollectYourPersonal
data.value: wWe collect your personal data in order to:

data.name: Privacy.GatherFeedBack
data.value: wgather feedback to improve our services

data.name: Privacy.RespondToAnyFeedback
data.value: wrespond to any feedback you send us, if you’ve asked us to

data.name: Privacy.MonitorUse
data.value: wmonitor use of the service to identify security threats

data.name: Privacy.MonitorThePerformance
data.value: wmonitor the performance of the service to identify inefficiencies and JavaScript errors

data.name: Privacy.WeUseTheInformation
data.value: wWe use the information we collect through Google Analytics and Azure Sentinel to see how you use GOV.UK and to see how well the service performs on your device.

data.name: Privacy.WeDoThisToHelp
data.value: wWe do this to help:

data.name: Privacy.MakeSureThe
data.value: wmake sure the ‘Report packaging data’ service is meeting the needs of its users

data.name: Privacy.MakeImprovements
data.value: wmake improvements to the service

data.name: Privacy.MakePerformanceImprovements
data.value: wmake performance improvements, for example improving page load time and data usage

data.name: Privacy.WeCombineGoogleAnalytics
data.value: wWe combine Google Analytics information with similar data from other government digital services to help understand and improve user journeys within GOV.UK and other government digital services.

data.name: Privacy.OurLegalBasis
data.value: wOur legal basis for processing your data

data.name: Privacy.TheLegalBasis
data.value: wThe legal basis for processing personal data in relation to site security is our legitimate interests, and the legitimate interests of our users, in ensuring the security and integrity of GOV.UK.

data.name: Privacy.TheLegalBasisGoogleAnalytics
data.value: wThe legal basis for processing data collected with Google Analytics and Azure Sentinel on GOV.UK and other government digital services is your consent.

data.name: Privacy.TheLegalBasisOther
data.value: wThe legal basis for processing all other personal data is that it’s necessary:

data.name: Privacy.ToPerformATask
data.value: wto perform a task in the public interest

data.name: Privacy.InTheExerciseOf
data.value: win the exercise of our functions as a government department

data.name: Privacy.WhatWeDoWithYourData
data.value: wWhat we do with your data

data.name: Privacy.TheDataWeCollect
data.value: wThe data we collect may be shared with other government departments, agencies and public bodies. It may also be shared with our technology suppliers, for example our hosting provider.

data.name: Privacy.WeWillShareYourData
data.value: wWe will share your data if we are required to do so by law - for example, by court order, or to prevent fraud or other crime.

data.name: Privacy.TheDataWeCollectGoogleAnalytics
data.value: wThe data we collect with Google Analytics cookies is transferred and stored with Google where we analyse it with Google Analytics software (Universal Analytics). We do not allow Google to use or share this data for their own purposes.

data.name: Privacy.WeWillNot
data.value: wWe will not:

data.name: Privacy.SellOrRent
data.value: wsell or rent your data to third parties

data.name: Privacy.ShareYourData
data.value: wshare your data with third parties for marketing purposes

data.name: Privacy.HowLongWeKeep
data.value: wHow long we keep your data

data.name: Privacy.WeWillOnlyRetain
data.value: wWe will only retain your personal data for as long as it is needed for the purposes set out in this document or for as long as the law requires us to.

data.name: Privacy.WeWill
data.value: wWe will:

data.name: Privacy.KeepYourFeedbackData
data.value: wkeep your feedback data for 2 years

data.name: Privacy.DeleteAccessLogData
data.value: wdelete access log data which contain your IP address after 90 days

data.name: Privacy.WhereYourDataIsProcessed
data.value: wWhere your data is processed and stored

data.name: Privacy.WeDesignBuildAndRun
data.value: wWe design, build and run our systems to make sure that your data is as safe as possible at all stages, both while it’s processed and when it’s stored.

data.name: Privacy.AllPersonalData
data.value: wAll personal data is stored in the

data.name: Privacy.EuropeanEconomicArea
data.value: wEuropean Economic Area

data.name: Privacy.DataCollectedByGoogleAnalytics
data.value: w(EEA). Data collected by Google Analytics and Azure Sentinel may be transferred outside the EEA for processing.

data.name: Privacy.HowWeProtect
data.value: wHow we protect your data and keep it secure

data.name: Privacy.WeAreCommitted
data.value: wWe are committed to doing all that we can to keep your data secure. We have set up systems and processes to prevent unauthorised access or disclosure of your data - for example, we protect your data using varying levels of encryption.

data.name: Privacy.WeAlsoMakeSure
data.value: wWe also make sure that any third parties that we deal with keep all personal data they process on our behalf secure.

data.name: Privacy.YourRights
data.value: wYour rights

data.name: Privacy.YouHaveTheRightToRequest
data.value: wYou have the right to request:

data.name: Privacy.InformationAbout
data.value: winformation about how your personal data is processed

data.name: Privacy.ACopyOf
data.value: wa copy of that personal data

data.name: Privacy.ThatAnythingInaccurate
data.value: wthat anything inaccurate in your personal data is corrected immediately

data.name: Privacy.YouCanAlso
data.value: wYou can also:

data.name: Privacy.RaiseAnObjection
data.value: wraise an objection about how your personal data is processed

data.name: Privacy.RequestThatYour
data.value: wrequest that your personal data is erased if there is no longer a justification for it

data.name: Privacy.AskThatTheProcessing
data.value: wask that the processing of your personal data is restricted in certain circumstances

data.name: Privacy.IfYouHaveAny
data.value: wIf you have any of these requests, email

data.name: Privacy.LinksToOtherWebsites
data.value: wLinks to other websites

data.name: Privacy.ContainsLinksToOtherWebsites
data.value: wGOV.UK contains links to other websites.

data.name: Privacy.ThisPrivacyNotice
data.value: wThis privacy notice only applies to the 'Report packaging data’ service on GOV.UK, and does not cover other government services and transactions that we link to. These services have their own terms and conditions and privacy policies.

data.name: Privacy.FollowingALinkToAnother
data.value: wFollowing a link to another website

data.name: Privacy.IfYouGoTo
data.value: wIf you go to another website from this one, read the privacy policy on that website to find out what it does with your information.

data.name: Privacy.FollowingALinkToGovUk
data.value: wFollowing a link to GOV.UK from another website

data.name: Privacy.IfYouComeTo
data.value: wIf you come to GOV.UK from another website, we may receive personal information from the other website. You should read the privacy policy of the website you came from to find out more about this.

data.name: Privacy.ContactUs
data.value: wContact us or make a complaint

data.name: Privacy.DefrasPersonal
data.value: wDefra’s Personal Information Charter

data.name: Privacy.ExplainsDefrasStandards
data.value: wexplains Defra’s standards for requesting and storing personal information.

data.name: Privacy.DefrasDataProtectionOfficer
data.value: wDefra’s Data Protection Officer

data.name: Privacy.TheDpoProvides
data.value: wThe DPO provides independent advice and monitoring of our use of personal information.

data.name: Privacy.InformationCommissioner
data.value: wInformation Commissioner

data.name: Privacy.YouAlsoHave
data.value: wYou also have the right to make a complaint to the

data.name: Privacy.WhoIsAnIndependent
data.value: w, who is an independent regulator.

data.name: Privacy.Telephone
data.value: wTelephone:

data.name: Privacy.Textphone
data.value: wTextphone:

data.name: Privacy.MondayToFriday
data.value: wMonday to Friday, 9am to 4.30pm

data.name: Privacy.FindOutAboutCallCharges
data.value: wFind out about call charges

data.name: Privacy.ChangesToThisPolicy
data.value: wChanges to this policy

data.name: Privacy.WeMayChange
data.value: wWe may change this privacy policy. In that case, the ‘last updated’ date at the bottom of this page will also change. Any changes to this privacy policy will apply to you and your data immediately.

data.name: Privacy.IfTheseChanges
data.value: wIf these changes affect how your personal data is processed, Defra will take reasonable steps to let you know.

data.name: Privacy.LastUpdated
data.value: wLast updated

data.name: Privacy.IfYourOrganisationIsRegistered
data.value: wif your organisation is registered to trade in the UK

data.name: Privacy.WhatTypeOfOrganisation
data.value: wwhat type of organisation you work for (whether it’s a limited company or charity, or you’re a sole trader)

data.name: Privacy.WhereYourOrganisationIs
data.value: wwhere your organisation is based in the UK

data.name: Privacy.YourCompaniesHouseNumber
data.value: wyour Companies House number (if you have one)

data.name: Privacy.YourName
data.value: wyour name

data.name: Privacy.YourOrganisationsDetails
data.value: wyour organisation’s details from Companies House (if you have a Companies House number)

data.name: Privacy.YourRoleInTheOrganisation
data.value: wyour role in the organisation (if you aren’t a sole trader)

data.name: Privacy.YourTelephoneNumber
data.value: wyour telephone number
